div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die mensis
septembris anno quo supra

The saide day the prouest balyeis Counsale and Communite of the saide burghe
opinly warnit be the hande bele and the officiaris throwe the haile toune gatht
rit and Inquerit Seueralie euire mane be him Self graunt and gaf to mastir'
gavane leslie thar perpetuale chaplanry of Sanct Jonhne the baptistis
altar situat' within that parroche kirk vacand be deces' of vmquhile mastir
Williame strathachin last possessor of the samyn Ande gilbert menyeis provest
gaf the saide chaplanry to mastir thomas chamer procurator for the saide mastir
gavane be the gift of his ringe Ande ordanit tentiwe writ to be
maid' tharapone and thar commone Seile to be appensit to the samyn

Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Secundo die mensis octobris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo octauo
Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent

Andreas Watsone
Thomas Dauisone
Duncanus andersoun'
Robertus Dauysone
Willelmus richerdsone
Thomas laisk
longus Walterus in monicabok
Andreas baxtar in Newburgh
Richardus Watsone
Thomas Watsone in gowllis
Thomas Wodmane'
Johannes Wilkesone
andreas Watsone in cullan
matheus Reid'
Andreas brabner
Symone mitchell
Willelmus lindesay
Dauid hay
georgius Jhonsoun'
Willelmus laisk
Johannes brekanche
Dauid bannerman
Johannes Watsone in garntuly
Willelmus bynne
Johannes herroun'

Eodem die Gilbertus Menyheis Electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro Anno Instanto prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die thomas leslie thomas Waus thomas Wod et
Duncanus collisone Electi fuerunt in officium Balliuorum
pro Anno Instanto prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Wilhelmus Scrimgeour Normannus leslie'
Andreas Naughtie et Johnnes Cuke Electi fuerunt in officium
sergeandorum pro Anno Instanto prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die accedens ad barram famosus vir Willelmus rolland' burgensis dicti burgj
et protestatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim solidorum monete scocie sibi
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta olim Willelmi
lyntone Jacente in futy inter terram ex boreali
ex vna et ex australi Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides Quos balliuis in Sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo gregory Andreas
mortymer burgensis dictj burgj et Andrea nauchtie sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas colli//
sone collector ac procurator capellanorum collegij sanctj nicholaij dictj
burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decim
solidorum dictis capellanis annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto
de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Nauium
ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
ex australi et vna et terram ex boreali partibus
ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens extendens ad montem
sancte Katherine versus occidens Ad quam terram ex accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides Quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo
gregory Andrea mortymer burgensibus dicti burgj et Andrea nacthtie sergeando

The said day Cuthberde Jhonsone oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to content and pay to ser Johnne stirueling chaplane xiij s'
iiij d' for his annuell of the hous of vmquhill robert blinsell at the fest
of Sanct martinj nixt tocum

The said day Comperit Willeame Wormet befor the baillies
In Jugement and renuncit and inclusit thar handis of the proces' and
pley betuix him and Androu fif led' in the buk obefor

The said day Johnne of myle duelland' in Meithlik oblist gim
be the faitht of his bodie to content and pay to Androw meldrum thre quar//
taris of Woll betuix this and the fest of Sanct martyn nixt hereftir

The saide day the prouest bailyeis counsale and communite gaddirit and' circualie
Inquerit be the officiaris for the sustentacioun and' wphaldin of divyne
seruice to the plesour' of gode the glorious' virgin mare and' ale Sanctis
Consentit ande frelie grantit to gif ale and' Sindrie thar perpetuale
chaplanreis to giddir with' the hospitale of Saint Thomas to sufficient
Sangistiris conuenient for thar lettrone and' queyr' ale perpetuale tymes
to cum and' ordanit ane lettir to be maid vndir thar commone Sele tharapone
in dew forme one the sikirast vis' cane be maid

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religious vir frater Johannes Spens procurator
prioris et conuentus domus fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xiij s' et quatuor denariorum
vsualis monete scocie dicto loco annuatim debito et a longo
tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta quondam Johannis gillespy
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico castrj ex australi parte eiusdem
vicj inter terram Johannis malisone ex occidentali et communiones vias
regias versus oriens et boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides / quos balliuis
in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Spens procurator
prioris et conuentus domus fratrum predicatorum dictj burgj et protestabatur
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vj s' et octo denariorum monete scocie
dicto loco annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta
quondam robertj club in vico superiori ecclesie inter terram henricus tulidef ex
occidentali et terram robertj Waus ex orientali Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam 2o die huius processus testibus

Curia gilde Burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretoriio Eiusdem
Sexto die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

Johnne leslie of Wardris
ser Johnne ruthirfurde
Johnne of cullane
Androw cullane
Johne' colisone
James colisone
Johnne of mar
Patry leslie
Androwe murray
Alexander gray
Dauid mar
Williame portar
Dauid andersone
Dauid steuart
Robert crag
Williame futhes
george bisset
Johanne blak
Androwe fyf
Williame Wormet
patry rede
Mathoue branche
Alexander malysone
Richeard Waus

Eodem die Johannes colisone et Johannes mar
electi fuerunt decanj gilde pro anno Instante
prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die georgius bisset electus fuit magister
fabrice ecclesie pro anno Instanto

head.add: Auditores compotorum magistri fabrice ecclesie et decanorum gilde

div.p:
Eodem die gilbertus menyheis prepositus Johannes ruthirfurde miles
Johannes Cullane Johanes colisone Jacobus colisone et Johannes mar
electj fuerunt Auditores compotorum magistri fabrice ecclesie et decanorum
gilde prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Willelmus murray Dauid fynne gavinus Murray Alexander malysone
Alexnader nory Dauid tailyeour Alexander King Andreas lousone Alexander
burnat Johannes Meldrum Dauid broys' Andreas Stevinsone
Willelmus stile Dauid Adamsone Jacobus strathauchin

Evin quartar gustatores seruicie
Thomas Wod balliuis et Johannes cuk sergeandus
Crukit quartar - Willelmus skene and, Walterus alansone - gustatores
Thomas Waus balliuis et Normannus leslie sergeandus
grene quartar - Thomas coule, Donaldus baxtar - gustatores
Duncanus colisone Balliuus et Andras nachtj sergeandus
futy quartar
Thoams elslie Balliuus et Willelmus scrimgeour sergeandus
Alexander stablar, Richardus fraser - gustatores

head.add: the grant of ane' tak to Ninian blinsel

div.p:
The said day thir personis eftir writin gilbert menyeis Prouest
ser Johanne ruthirfurd knicht Johanne colisone James colisone Johnne of
mar Thomas Waus thomas leslie duncan colisone patry leslie
Dauid Mar Alexander gray Johnne blak george bisset William Wor//
met Alexander malysone richerd Waus Jonne Arthour and gavan
of murray grauntit ande consentit to gif to Niniane blinseile
ane conuenient tak of thar fischeingis of the wattir of Dee at thare
next generale assedacioun to be maid

head.add: disposicio capallanorum ad communitatem dicti burgi pertinenciis

div.p:
The said day the Prouest bailyheis Counsaile and communite present for the
tyme for wphaldin of diuine seruice decoring of haly kirk ande
plesour of gode the blissed virgin mare Sanct nicholace thar
patrone and ale Sanctis ale in ane voce concordand grantit ande
consentit that ale thar perpetuale chaplanreis and Sanct thomas hospitale
being at thar gift donacione and presentacioun salbe gevin perpetuale tile
Sangstaris that can syng plane sang ande prik sang at the lest ande
specialie to barnis burges Sonnys and natiue mene borne of the
toune befor ale vthiris ande ordanit ane autentive writ to be
maide tharapone ande Selit with thar commone Seile perpetualie
tile endur'

head.add: statut' of ane tvne fracht to sanct nicholar mark /

div.p:
The said day it was statut' ande ordanit be the Prouest bailyeis
ande counsaile that the mastir of the kirkwark sale haue ane tone fracht
of euery schip that beis frachtit

The said day Alexander gray yongar grantit hm awand to
Willeame turing of foverne ane gret covntour of the singill fow
quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum Burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem ix die
mensis octobris Anno quo supra

The said day Duncan Wandy was in ane amerciament of the court be his avin
tvng grant for tribulance of Johnne colisone Johnne of mar denys of
the gilde et cetera et tile amende as lawe wile ande forber' in tyme to cum
et cetera quhilk mendis was continewit to friday that nixt cumis to the Prouest
and bailyeis

The said day Duncan Wandy was conuict' be ane suorne assis' ser Johne'
ruthirfurde forspekar for forstalling of the burgh' in bying of woll for the
quhilk he was in ane amerciament of the court Item the said Duncan conuict' the
be the said assis' for forstalling of the burgh' in bying of skynnis for the quhilk
he was in ane amerciament of the court Item the said Duncan was conuict' be the
said assis' for forstalling of the burgh' in bying of hydis for the quhilkis he
wasin ane amerciament of the court tile amende as lawe wile ande
forber' in tyme to cum ande that was gevin for dome

The said day It was statut' ande ordanit be the Prouest bailyeis ande
counsaile that nay huxstaris nor meilbyaris be funin in the mercat for
xxtj dais vndir the pane of eschet of thar meil that thai by ande viij s'
vnforgevin to the bailyeis vnlawe ande pvnising of thar personis be the
avis' of the gudmen of the toun

It is statut' ande ordanit be the Prouest bailyeis ande counsaile
that the litsteris of this burgh' sale wesche ale thar clais at the burne
passand fra the west end of the loche to the dene burne Ande that
any litstaris skynnaris cordonaris nor craftismen sale wesche thar stuf
in the loche nor commone rinelis of the toune in tyme to cum Ande sale
clois' thar ventis of thar guttaris cumande fra thar wirk hous' Ande
sale distroy the samyne ande cast nay filtht cumande out of
thar werk hous' in to the loche nor rinelis within xxiiij houris
nixt her' eftir

The said day Duncan fyf offerit hyme redy tile ansuer' at the
instance of Dauid colp in ony thingis he had to say to hyme he
fyndand borrowis apone hyme

The said day marioun fyf was conuict' be ane assis ser Johnne' ruthir
furd forspekar for tribulance of Agnes Kynnour' for the quhilkis scho
was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera Ande gif euir scho committis
ony tribulance to the said Agnes in tyme to cum and beis conuict' tharof
scho sale be put in the goif

The said day Willeame Walcar grantit that he come dettour
to the relict' of vmquhill Dauid menyeis for Johnne of Keitht in
Dis' for iij dusane of salmond' fische quhilkis the balyeis
chargit to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem duodecimo
die mesis octobris Anno quo supra

The said day Androu Jhonsone fischear in futy was conuict' be
ane suorne assis' Johnne of mar forspekar for the strublance of Androw
Archebald' and till amend' as law will and forber in tyme tocum And'
the said Androu quh quyt of all strublance of the said Androw Jhone'/
sone

Eodem die Dauid tailyeour deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas
Archbald' erit Inempnes pro Andrea Johnesone aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Wilellmus Rolland' deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas Jhonsone
erit Indempnes per andrea Archbald' aliter quam per viam Juris Et
dictos partes conseruabunt suos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimotercio
die mensis octobris Anno quo supra

The said day patry reid' grantit to pay or ger be pait to Syme of
Ellone xij stane of woll to Syme of within xv dais of the thrid part
of the Rest of the woll awand' to the said Syme

The burgh' fundin be William Wormet on' Androw fif for the wranguis' with
haldin fra of half ane vnicorne and tua li' of wax price xxx d' was
of nain awaill be ane suorne assis' as It was strikin for the quhilkis
the said Willeame was amerciament of the said court And aucht till haue
preuileg to strik ane new borgh'

The said day Alexander Makysone myllar of the Justice myllis was conuikit
be ane suorne assis' James colisone forspekar for the castin of gilbert
tulideffis corne out of the hoppir Ande was conuict' in the Name of his
wif for tribulance of the wif of the saide gilbert for the quhilkis he
was in tua ane amerciamentis of the court et cetera

The saide day the wif of gilbert tulidef was conuikit be the saide
assis' for the tribulance of the wif of the said alexander makysone
myllar ffor the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo
quarto die mensis octobris Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne of cullan
forspekar that Willeame Inuovr and Wilyeame Dauisone quhitfischearis
aucht to serue gilbert menyeis Prouost and mak him seruice in his bait
in futy be payand' thame thar fee that thai aucht of ressoun'

The said bessy sanclar was in amerciament of the said court be ane
suorne assis' Johnne of cullane forspekar for strublance of mag mate/
land' and' till amend' as law will and forber in tyme tocum And
atour the sad assis' ordanit the said bessy to deliuer the cloik that scho has of
the said magis to hir incontinent

The said day bessy sanclair was in amerciament of the court fundin be the
said assis' for dissobeing of thomas leslie and Duncan colisone in
the execucioun' of thar office And till amend' as law will et cetera

The said day cristy symmer was conuict' be ane suorne assis' Johnne'
cullan' forspekar for the wranguis' withhalding of ane wranguis'
pek selling aitis And' till amend' as law will and forber' in tym tocum .
